alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 9:43AM PST until January 04 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches expected through Tuesday morning. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
